title: i always get the site in a hanging state whenever i try signing in to any site that uses Captcha validation.
content: Simple. allow your app to use Captcha validation when logging-in to any site which uses it.
creator: schaefespeare

title: Search reults always show "more results"
content: It annoys me that whenever I search I get about 10 results before seeing the "More results" button. Usually 2 of those results are "sponsored". Often there are also results that are rubbish. This leaves about 4-6 results that are actually useful. I don't remember EVER not using the "More results" button. Is there any way I can change this so I get at least 50 results?
creator: dneilsen.act

title: Error message: Platform version *130.0.1* is not compatible with minVersion>=130.0 maxVersion < =130.0
content: What is the meaning of this message and what can be done to fix it? It's on my other computer.
creator: familyco

title: Config setting "findbar.highlightAll" is reset when "Search for text when you start typing" is enabled
content: I have "findbar.highlightAll" set to true in about: config so that text I search for is always highlighted. But if I enable "Search for text when you start typing" that setting gets reset to false when I perform a search. Is there a way to keep "findbar.highlightAll" set to true? Or is this a bug?
creator: xmgkefaesltnbkcdeq
